rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: Open and airy entrance space with natural light

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation, designed to face the east as per Vastu principles

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, located in the southeast corner for prosperity and activity, ensuring natural light and proper ventilation

rooms.name: dining area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room and kitchen, optimally placed for family gatherings with ample sunlight

rooms.name: guest bathroom
rooms.description: Private guest bathroom ensuring privacy while following natural ventilation norms

openings.description: Large glass entrance for ample light
Balconies providing additional cross-ventilation and natural light

rooms.name: master bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom on the north side to maximize morning sunlight, equipped with large windows for ventilation

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom ensuring privacy and natural light

rooms.name: study room
rooms.description: Quiet area placed in the east for productivity and focus

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom, well-ventilated with natural light

rooms.name: ensuite bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom

openings.description: Windows on multiple walls to ensure cross-ventilation and natural light
Balcony door facilitating access to a small private outdoor space

rooms.name: home theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater space with optimized acoustics and ambient lighting; designed to be away from noisy areas

rooms.name: bedroom_4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring balanced spatial distribution and natural light

openings.description: Roof window to allow natural light in the home theater without compromising acoustics
